name: Michael Bruice
description: I’m nice, strong and bright person, cheerful, honest, sincere, confident person. I know what I want from my life. I take care of and protect my beloved. I’m well balanced, very educated, attentive and generous man. Always very optimistic , respectful, and when I found a really love, I give her all my self and all my love. I like so much travel in all the world due to my area of specialization as a building and construction engr, i like gospel music, nature, mountain and beautiful beaches of white sand, I play piano, I play tennis, and I like so much to ski in winter in the Alps and in summer in the glaciers. I am a more of a business type as well, and I have a very good quality of life. I live alone, Kids are grown and on their own.
